reviews.review:
Game is hard to rate but I'll try. 
Pros:
-Tutorial for new people
-Easy gameplay
-New content every 3 months
-2 modes
-Can play with friends
Cons:
-The wrong side is overpowered. Survivor is clearly stronger than killer.
-Bugs don't get fixed for a long time
-devs have shaky communication with the community
-Constant delays on events, and new chapters
-grindy
-Solo play can be a nightmare
-Feels like devs don't listen to feedback sometimes
-Community is not that friendly

Overall its got a lot of flaws, but its flaws are fixable. It just depends largely on Devs, which I think are the biggest problem with this game. I still recommend it because it has been getting slightly better and I still have fun with it.

Dead by Daylight is an Asymmetric multiplayer game. It has had overwhelming success and has received licensing deals with some of horror's major characters. There's something special about going head to head with Freddy, Myers, Leatherface, The Pig and others that you can't get elsewhere.

The game is fun and I enjoy it greatly. 

However, Dead by Daylight is a COMMITMENT. There is so much DLC and so many perks and bloodwebs to grind 'XP' for, that it's incredibly daunting. I had over 500 hours in game before I had all the teachables I wanted unlocked (That's unlocked, not learned) and I'm about to start prestiging characters. 

It's not kind to new players, but once you achieve a modicum of skill and comfort, it can be a really enjoyable experience. 

Unless you play killer, in which case enjoy the gen-rush meta.

Среди явных преимуществ данной игры - разнообразие персонажей с набором уникальных умений. Будь то выживший или убийца. Интересные матчевые карты не дают скучать и делают игру более привлекательной для пользователей. Игра не лишена всевозможных игровых коллизий и опусов (попросту багов). Однако команда DBD постоянно работает над улучшением игрового процесса. Подтверждение тому - регулярные патчи и обновления.
P.S.
Играть в эту игру действительно стоит. И не только Вам, но Вашим друзьям.

This game is fun for a week or 2 until the bad parts above mentioned become so hard to ignore it just saps you of all the fun you could have.

I've played the game after the latest patch 3.7 wich aimed to rebalance most of the maps and ,while most of what i said above is still true to this day, the game seemed to get streamlined to a better experience.
But as awlays 1 step ahead and 2 behind.
The most bothersome  thing i've had to deal with lately was cheaters, cheaters, cheaters everywhere. And while they can sidestep the intrusive antivac alltogheter that comes with this game, you have to deal with it and if  you want to report, you can't: you have to  make a video of the thing happening (because every random player is sure to have a recording app in the background OF COURSE) and then send it yourself because the report button is simply a placebo of times gone by when people wanted one to report "toxic" and "troll"

Dead by Daylight

Un juego de terror multijugador que nos pone en piel de un superviviente el cual deberá escapar de las garras de un mortal asesino, o como un asesino el cuál deberá acabar con 4 supervivientes en total, antes de que estos terminen de reparar 5 generadores para activar la electricidad de 2 puertas de salida que están por el mapa.

El concepto es sencillo, la experiencia es buena cuando se empieza a jugar, te asustas, pones nervioso y es divertido, el juego suena simple, pero hay habilidades que pueden dar vuelta las tablas de una partida y diferentes factores que meten la tensión al juego. Voy a salvar a mi compañero o termino de reparar este generador? Voy a perseguir a ese superviviente o interrumpo la reparación de los demás?

Y esto es bueno, pero a medida que pasan las horas, te das cuenta que no es un juego balanceado, en altos rangos, el superviviente es el que tiene más chance de ganar una partida antes que el asesino. Y los desarrolladores parecen no ser concientes de eso. Puede ser que sea un juego dificil de ajustar, pero hacen lo contrario, brindan más herramientas a los supervivientes, haciendo que haya mucho más supervivientes que asesino, por lo cual la busqueda de partidas es más larga, y jugar de asesino termina siendo más frustrante y tenso que jugar de superviviente.

El juego posee microtransacciones y DLC's que te permiten jugar con habilidades diferentes para hacer diferente tipos de jugadas. Son bastantes caros, por suerte las habilidades o "perks" de los personajes pueden adquirirse gratis, si le dedicas horas al juego, pero los asesinos (que cuentan con habilidades diferentes) no.

Un juego con un concepto simple, entretenido, puede ser divertido, pero también tedioso, injusto y frustrante varias veces

7/10

I've been playing this game for roughly 2 years now, mainly being interested in playing Killers, but I ended up playing both sides alot, mainly because playing Killer all the time would have cost me a coronary bypass.

Don't let the developers fool you, this game is designed to pull in people to play as survivors, and it shows. Suvivor gameplay is roughly as complicated as playing a round of tetris with few alternations depending on the Killer you are up against. Meanwhile to play (some) Killers well you need a doctorates degree in quantum physics. The game in completely unbalanced in higher ranks, and as Killer you rely on the Survivors you are facing to be idiots, plainly said, or them not taking the game seriously.

As soon as you get to higher ranks some Killers become downright unplayable. The devs continue to make the game easier and "more accessible" for survivors without taking the Killers perspective into account at all.

After 2 years of this, I have given up on waiting for the devs to actually balance this game to a reasonable degree. And to be fair, they actually stated that they would never do that, because they don't care about you getting good at the game. High ranks games are the minority, and therefore the game is balanced for low ranks. Which, again, means that at higher ranks, where Survivors skill-cap is higher (because there are 4 of them, which all can be great at the game), Killers are by default on the back foot.

This also perpetuates an incredibly toxic community, as the Survivor players start to feel entitled to escape, as it got so easy. Games where you don't get flamed at the end as Killer are actually a rarity.

Other than the gameplay, the game is pretty good. Graphics are outdated, but work well enough, even though the game is way too dark most of the time. Killer designs are great. Story is acceptable for a multiplayer game.

Bottom line?
Don't buy it unless the Devs actually see what they are doing wrong and take steps to fix it. But considering they haven't in the 2 years I've been playing, and the 4 years it's been out, I wouldn't count on it happening.

This game is actually pretty good for u and UR friends. Of course, friends. Not any online friends but actual REAL LIFE friends. U can do many fun things here to ur friends such as trapping them, exposing where they hiding, blocking them off pallets or windows and many more! I am not gonna lie but when i first play this game i was so scare whenever i hear the heart beat ( which is a notice of the killer is near u ). But there's just 2 thing i don't like about this game. Players that only care about completing generators and Killer that camps. I mean yes escaping the game is the way to win for survivor but come on.. when someone is hooked, u gotta save them ( if they its actually save to save or u are willing to change position with him/her ) thats hw u ACTUALLY play the game. SURVIVE AND WIN TGT not finishing it by urself?!?!?! 
    Thats the end of my review.

[h1] 作为一个主要玩屠夫的玩家，我感觉必须为屠夫玩家说一句，[/h1] 
关于在正常操作下，怎么去进行游戏都是一个玩家的自由。凭什么我守尸就要被骂？
拜托，你们是在玩一个非平衡的游戏！非平衡懂么？我是S手，我要S人。
你们满脑子都是：遛屠夫五台机，手电筒晃瞎屠夫，屠夫抱人的时候去卡位置不让屠夫上钩，之前还有高空落下打到屠夫眩晕（这个bug已经修复）还有最可气的就是，倒地就拔线，要上钩就拔线，马上三挂就拔线。真就只许州官放火，不许百姓点灯、、

然后我站在被我钩中的猎物边上等待（不是贴脸哦） 就要被你骂。
（还有我是属于不守尸的那种，我感觉浪费我节奏。但是人人都是一样。那这个游戏好玩吗？
但是我每次玩人类或者有听到有人说：“啊，这个sb屠夫司马的又守。”这样类似的话
我就很纳闷，和心烦。难道你[spoiler] 看视频打飞机，到一半又换部AV继续打飞机？[/spoiler] 
上面的形容没有侮辱不守尸屠夫的意思，只是打个比方。毕竟我自己也不守。

还有，告诉你们碰到守尸的屠夫，就不要去救人了。麻烦直接修电机，啪亮一台，啪又亮一台。你看屠夫慌还是你慌
就算他真的不管你电机情况，这局他最多杀两个人了。

给差评是为了给更多人看见，这个游戏本身除了服务器。其他都是上品。什么几个国产的想追上来还需要一段时间。

Множество багов (вылеты, дисконекты), ужасный матчмэйкинг (ищет долго, кидает новичков с опытными игроками), зато ДЛЦ клепают очень быстро. В целом то игра интересная, но вектор развития не в ту сторону направлен.

For most of my games, I have high hours because I leave them idle. This game is an exception though. I have played over 150 hours and I can confidently recommend this game to anyone that has friends who are also willing to play. The gameplay is great with friends, it is intense and even though it has you doing the same task, it feels like a new experience every time. I play with one other friend, and I would certainly have double that many hours if I had 3 or 4. (plus it goes on sale all the time and is super cheap)
I recommend everyone play this game.
